metadata.title: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Continuous Track

components.title: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Continuous Track
components.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Continuous Track based on DOD SRG/STIG.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-5.1.

implemented-requirements.description:
Adobe Reader DC must disable the ability to add Trusted Files and Folders.
Adobe Reader DC must disable the ability to elevate IE Trusts to Privileged Locations.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-5.6.

implemented-requirements.description: Adobe Reader DC must disable the ability to change the Default Handler.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-7.

implemented-requirements.description:
Adobe Reader DC must disable the Adobe Send and Track plugin for Outlook.
Adobe Reader DC must disable all service access to Document Cloud Services.
Adobe Reader DC must disable Cloud Synchronization.
Adobe Reader DC must disable the Adobe Repair Installation.
Adobe Reader DC must disable 3rd Party Web Connectors.
Adobe Reader DC must disable Acrobat Upsell.
Adobe Reader DC must disable Adobe Send for Signature.
Adobe Reader DC must disable access to Webmail.
Adobe Reader DC must disable Online SharePoint Access.
Adobe Reader DC must disable the Adobe Welcome Screen.
Adobe Reader DC must disable Service Upgrades.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-13.

implemented-requirements.description: Adobe Reader DC must enable FIPS mode.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.1.

implemented-requirements.description:
Adobe Reader DC must enable Enhanced Security in a Standalone Application.
Adobe Reader DC must enable Enhanced Security in a Browser.
Adobe Reader DC must enable Protected Mode.
Adobe Reader DC must enable Protected View.
Adobe Reader DC must Block Websites.
Adobe Reader DC must block access to Unknown Websites.
Adobe Reader DC must prevent opening files other than PDF or FDF.
Adobe Reader DC must block Flash Content.

Adobe Reader DC must enable Enhanced Security in a Standalone Application.
Adobe Reader DC must enable Enhanced Security in a Browser.
Adobe Reader DC must enable Protected Mode.
Adobe Reader DC must enable Protected View.
Adobe Reader DC must Block Websites.
Adobe Reader DC must block access to Unknown Websites.
Adobe Reader DC must prevent opening files other than PDF or FDF.
Adobe Reader DC must block Flash Content.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-23.5.

implemented-requirements.description:
Adobe Reader DC must disable periodical uploading of European certificates.
Adobe Reader DC must disable periodical uploading of Adobe certificates.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement si-2.

implemented-requirements.description: Adobe Reader DC must have the latest Security-related Software Updates installed.
